offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties agree to the terms specified in the contract.

consideration.description: Wages and employment benefits provided to Party B.
consideration.value: Details of wage payments and benefits.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties intend for this contract to be legally binding.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The contract is formed in accordance with labor laws of the People's Republic of China.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Employment position and responsibilities of Party B.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: Contract duration defined in separate terms.

contract.consent: Parties agree and consent to the terms by signing the contract.

durationAndTermination.duration: Contract is fixed-term from MM/DD/YY to MM/DD/YY.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Conditions for termination during the probation period and other circumstances stated.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: The contract may be renewed upon expiration through negotiation.

signatures.declaration: Party A affirms the terms of the contract.
Party B affirms the terms of the contract.

disputeResolution.details: Disputes to be resolved by labor arbitration committee where Party A is located.

governingLawAndJurisdiction.governingLaw: The laws of the People's Republic of China.
governingLawAndJurisdiction.jurisdiction: Jurisdiction of the court where Party A is located.
